definition: Shitai county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Shitai county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui

sentences.english: Smooth mirror reflective finish on a marble bathroom countertop enhances its looks.
sentences.chinese: 浴室大理石臺面的鏡面反射可以增強其視覺效果。

sentences.english: The measurement of in-site crustal stresses are carried out in Yan Shi Tai coal mine.
sentences.chinese: 對硯石臺煤礦地應力進行了現場測試。

sentences.english: Who pull out this sword from this stone and anvil is duly born King of all England.
sentences.chinese: 凡能從石臺上拔出此劍者，即爲英格蘭的天命之王。
